description: A lightweight hooded jacket built to pack a punch against chilly conditions. A water-resistant shell, thermal-reflective lining, 650-fill down insulation, and stitch-free baffling keep wet out and warmth in. Zip hand pockets and binding at the hood, cuffs, and hem deliver utility and a secure fit.
name: Columbia Sportswear Delta Ridge Down Hooded Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 100% polyester, 650 Fill Power Down Insulation, RDS Certified
